title: Carandiru
writer: Hector Babenco, Fernando Bonassi, Victor Navas, Dráuzio Varella (book)
actors: Luiz Carlos Vasconcelos, Milton Gonçalves, Ivan de Almeida, Ailton Graça
plot: Brazilian MD Drauzio Varella starts AIDS prevention in Brazil's largest prison, Carandiru, in São Paulo, where the population is nearly double its 4,000 maximum. Doc learns from experience ...
